ygData.subject: RE: Twinking & Kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, let me rephrase what I am saying.  It wasnt 5 hours it was 10 real hour days.  But not back to back.  If you type /played at the screen it gives you the
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, let me rephrase what I am saying. It wasnt 5 hours it was 10 real
hour days. But not back to back. If you type /played at the screen it
gives you the total time you have spent with that character in the game.

5 real life hours would be insane to make it that high. :)

Mr. J Daniels


On Mon, 12 Jul 1999, KAUFFMAN,ROBERT (HP-FtCollins,ex1) wrote:

> From: "KAUFFMAN,ROBERT (HP-FtCollins,ex1)" <robert_kauffman@...>
>
> I could be wrong but I think a game day is about 1.5 hours real time. So
> Mr. J Daniels account would fit into what I heard about getting someone to
> level 20 in 5 hours. This is all hear-say but I believe it. Here is how I
> heard they did it.
>
> First new character is outfitted in high level equipment and kick a??
> weapon.
> Then a group of 40+ characters buff the newbie; spells like Resolution,
> Symbol of Naltron, Armor of Faith from a cleric. Talisman of Altune,
> Stamina, Guardian, Alacrity, Agility from a shaman.
>
> Next Tanks go in on a level 20+ creature and taunt, clerics cast immobilize
> and the newbie starts hitting on it. If need be the cleric heals. Once the
> creature is under half health the high level group takes it out and the
> newbie gets lots and lots of exp.
>
> Of course, if the RL person behind this character hadn't played before they
> have completely ruined the game for them.
>
> It will be fun to test this idea out one day, but for now I need to work my
> way up high.
>
> Fidan
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mr. J Daniels [mailto:warpig@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 12, 1999 2:27 PM
> To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Twinking & Kiting
>
> Thats 10 GAME days, not 10 REAL days non-stop.
>
> Mr. J Daniels
>
>
> On Mon, 12 Jul 1999, David Bradshaw wrote:
> From: "David Bradshaw" <Logain@...>
>
> What did they tag team playing the character? Keep it going 24/7?
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mr. J Daniels <warpig@...>
> Date: Monday, July 12, 1999 12:52 PM
> Subject: RE: [EQ-Clerics] Twinking & Kiting
> From: "Mr. J Daniels" <warpig@...>
>
> The most extreme case of twinking I have seen is making level 30 with 10
> game days played.
>
> Mr. J Daniels
>
>
> On Mon, 12 Jul 1999, Rob Berryhill wrote:
> From: "Rob Berryhill" <racefan@...>
>
> Absolutely NO way that is true. Even with MAJOR twinking they still would
> not hit well. 5 days would be an accomplishment, and 5 hours is just WAY
> beyond impossible.
>
> Astur, Cleric of Brell
> Solusek Ro
